channel.title: Cannot Wear Items (rep++)
channel.description:
Really weird error, not sure if it's due to how the packets are configured though.
I can't wear any non custom. I have no idea what the hell I did, but I do not believe I modified anything.
My server is hugely based off customs (ID's more than 8000), they're all able to be worn, but not the regular items that are below 8000.
The problem is not server sided. It's definately something I did wrong in 'client' or 'class8'.
Any help?

item.title: Cannot Wear Items (rep++)
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Really weird error, not sure if it’s due to how the packets are configured though.

I can’t wear any non custom. I have no idea what the hell I did, but I do not believe I modified anything.

My server is hugely based off customs (ID’s more than 8000), they’re all able to be worn, but not the regular items that are below 8000.

The problem is not server sided. It’s definately something I did wrong in ‘client’ or ‘class8’.

Any help?
